==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Sanjay:''' Zzz... Zzz...
:{{DIcon}} Are you alright?
::'''Sanjay:''' I... can keep going! I can still do it...

::'''Sanjay:''' For the sake of... the port's trade flow... I must...
:{{DIcon}} Please take care...
::'''Sanjay:''' I... am okay...
{{Dialogue end}}
